ygData.subject: Re: Tarew's Aquatic Ayre
ygData.msgSnippet: Where in Highpass is the bank? I ve looked and looked - and not found it. I also admit I scaled back my search somewhat out of concern over some nasty
ygData.messageBody:
Where in Highpass is the bank? I've looked and looked - and not found it. I
also admit I scaled back my search somewhat out of concern over some nasty
prisoners I've heard about in there.

>>>>>
There is a bank in High Hold, so you don't have to risk any valuable
equipment and money on the trip over; although the place was
so camped when I went (the mobs there give no less than three
highly desired magic items) that I didn't even need
Accelerando and just walked in. The layout of HH Pass is
rather confusing, and if you don't mind getting a map online,
I suggest you do so. There are no 90 degree turns in the
place, and it's very easy to get disoriented.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
